description.value:
This bottle of frozen vapors is captured in the frozen peaks of the crown of the world. After inhaling frost breath, you gain resistance 5 to cold. You can exhale the frost breath as a single action to release a spray of frigid air in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15]. Each creature in the area takes @Damage[4d6[cold]|traits:area-damage] damage with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:20|basic:true] save. For 10 minutes, surfaces in the area are covered in ice, becoming difficult terrain and uneven ground (@Check[type:acrobatics|dc:20]).

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.Effect: Frost Breath]
